1.title: The I-10 Predator
1.plot: The FBI races to save 11 year old Leah Henry from a sexual sadist who kidnaps and tortures young girls along Interstate 10. The kidnapper's level of violence increases with each victim and the FBI knows there's not a moment to waste if they hope to find Leah alive.

2.title: Sex, Murder, and Video Tape
2.plot: When a dozen young women turn up dead across St. Louis, police and the FBI work to piece together the identity of a sadistic serial killer. He plays a ruthless game of cat and mouse, taunting investigators, until his final kill -- which haunt many to this day.

3.title: Lurking Menace
3.plot: The FBI and Citrus County Sheriff's detectives search for missing 9 year-old Jessica Lunsford who disappeared from her bed in the middle of the night. Everyone's a suspect until investigators unearth a terrible secret that lies close to home.

4.title: The Black Widow
4.plot: When 31 year-old Robert O'Dubaine is found shot to death, this apparent gangland hit unravels into a tragic case of betrayal - and sends the FBI and Chicago police on the hunt for a lethal temptress whose hoping to elude authorities in the heart of paradise.

5.title: Bound for Murder
5.plot: When two young girls go missing from a small northern California town, the FBI and local police go on high alert searching out the girls and a serial predator before he strikes again. It will take the courage of one tiny hero to put an end to an evil killer who knows no limits.

6.title: You Belong to Me
6.plot: After three people are murdered inside a Jacksonville home, the FBI and police track a man desperate enough to raft across the Rio Grande and seek refuge inside a Mexican prison. His release sparks a worldwide manhunt for a mass murderer with the looks and charm to blend in anywhere.

7.title: Bronx Butcher
7.plot: When FBI Special Agent Mike Clarke begins an Albanian murder investigation, his efforts to help solve a European serial killing leads to The Bronx, NY and the unsolved murder of Mary Beal. The NYPD and the FBI find themselves on the hunt for a possible intercontinental killer.

8.title: Taken by Force
8.plot: When a 16-year-old girl is kidnapped at gunpoint by a vicious drug gang, Arlington, Texas Police and the FBI launch an intense search for the teen. Weeks go by before a twist of fate leads investigators to her captors, but will they find young Lisa Rene before it's too late?

9.title: Off the Radar
9.plot: When a police dispatcher mysteriously disappears from her Georgia home the FBI and local police launch a desperate search to find her. Inconsistent theories of her whereabouts make agents suspect that someone close to the investigation is purposely misleading them.

10.title: 50 Shades of Evil
10.plot: When several women are hunted and sexually tortured in the Denver area, local police and the FBI fear they have a violent serial rapist in their midst. Soon, they learn of similar attacks across the country, and pressure mounts to find this predator before he strikes again.

1.title: Murder by Mail
1.plot: A federal judge and civil rights attorney are killed instantly when mail package bombs are delivered to them.

2.title: Dangerous Obsession
2.plot: Sidney Resi, the head of Exxon International is being held for ransom.

3.title: Shots Fired
3.plot: A shooting at the North Granada Hills Jewish Community Center terrifies local residents.

4.title: Lethal Content
4.plot: An unexpected twist changes everything eleven years after a young socialite is gunned down in her home.

5.title: I've Been Watching You
5.plot: While investigating a series of late-night assaults in Bloomington, Ill., police are perplexed by the assailant's high degree of criminal savvy, then the perpetrator's true identity comes to light and shakes investigators to the core.

6.title: Trail of Terror
6.plot: Fear escalates as a town's history of abduction, murder and drugs are exposed after three female hikers go missing.

7.title: Taken
7.plot: Fear grips a small community when a young girl vanishes on her way to school.

8.title: Internet Slave Master
8.plot: A series of young women and one small child have disappeared under mysterious circumstances and authorities dig deep in the underworld.

9.title: Missing in Missouri
9.plot: The small town of Richwoods, Missouri is horrified when an 11 year old boy vanishes without a trace; then a second boy disappears.

10.title: Monsters Among Us
10.plot: Local sheriff's department and the FBI join forces on a brutal mass murder that shook a rural town.

11.title: The Hunted
11.plot: Weapons hidden in caches are connected to a series of crimes that have baffled the bureau for over 20 years.

1.title: Stolen Innocence
1.plot: Eight-year-old Sandra Cantu is playing outside her mobile home in Tracy, California when she vanishes into thin air. Only a surveillance tape provides clues about who took her. Local authorities call in the FBI's specialized Child Abduction Response Unit, as they race to find Sandra alive. The FBI's list of potential suspects grows frighteningly long as they discover sex offenders and predators who live in the trailer park. Even a Sunday School teacher raises their suspicions. When Sandra's body is eventually found, they must race to stop the killer before another ...

2.title: Cold Streets
2.plot: In Anchorage, Alaska, a nurse practitioner doesn't show up for lunch with her friends. Her car is found in an airport parking lot... and surveillance footage from a local bank shows that someone has her debit card. The FBI helps local police track down suspects... and soon learns that a neighbor has a terrifying past... that includes being accused of murder. What they don't know is whether they can prove he's guilty... or if he'll get away with it once again.

3.title: Deadly Seven
3.plot: Seven convicted felons, including a rapist and murderer, escape from a Texas prison in broad daylight. They then rob a local sporting goods store, stocking up on guns and ammunition. When a local police officer shows up on the scene, he is brutally murdered. The Texas Seven flee, with the FBI hot on their trial. They hide in plain sight...until one by one, the Bureau starts bringing them down.

4.title: The Gainesville Ripper
4.plot: A killing spree horrifies residents of Gainesville, FL when five college students are found brutally murdered in three days.

5.title: Flesh & Blood
5.plot: Mario Centobie kidnaps his wife and son, and takes them on a terrifying journey of rape and assault. He is jailed, but blames his wife for his sentence and plots to get free. He manages to escape - twice - killing a police officer, taking hostages, charming a prison guard, and leading the FBI on a wild chase through the back roads of the Deep South along the way. The FBI must scramble to stop him before he is able to take revenge on his family.

6.title: The Butcher
6.plot: Danny Ray Horning robs a Winslow, Arizona bank, and is linked to a gruesome murder that took place months before. But the dangerous criminal manages to walk out of a prison in broad daylight, setting off a massive manhunt with the FBI. He takes hostages and terrorizes families as he leads Agents on a wild chase through the Grand Canyon. Even with hundreds of agents and law enforcement hot on his trail, Horning proves to be a formidable fugitive as he manages to stay one step ahead of them.

7.title: Twisted Obsession
7.plot: A young mother of quintuplets is brutally murdered in her home, her young toddlers the only witnesses. The police are able to locate her killer... but have no motive for the crime. The FBI must delve into her past to unravel who really wanted her dead...and paid to make it happen. Their investigation leads them to a manipulative and twisted puppeteer, who will prove almost impossible to bring down.

8.title: Outlaw
8.plot: In the backwoods of Louisiana, Jesse James Caston gets in a heated argument with his wife and shoots her. He then goes to the home of his wife's best friend, and shoots her while she's in bed with her boyfriend. The murders set off a bloody rampage that endangers the townspeople of Lake Providence, local police, and eventually, the FBI. Caston is a killer with a hit list... and unless the FBI can find him, the bloodshed will continue.

10.title: Predator
10.plot: A beautiful young college student is abducted in broad daylight, leaving behind only a pair of torn flip-flops. A mysterious green van was spotted on the college campus but the leads go nowhere, and the case grows cold. A suspect is finally arrested, but agents question whether he's really the killer. Everything changes when another assault on a college campus takes place several states away...putting the FBI on the right track.

11.title: Unbreakable
11.plot: In the dead of the night, a little girl is asleep in her room when a stranger abducts her, sexually assaults her, and slits her throat. She defeats the odds and lives... and even regains her voice. But the predator remains at large... for almost 20 years. It will take the expertise of the FBI to solve the case...and bring justice to an amazing survivor.

12.title: Baby Grace
12.plot: The body of a toddler girl is found in a box in a waterway in Galveston, Texas. Who is the child, and why was she murdered and disposed of so callously? Investigators are stumped, and must call in the FBI on a case that garners international attention. Hundreds will wonder if the pretty little blonde girl is their missing loved one...but only one family will have to bear the terrible news that Baby Grace is actually their child.

13.title: Sex and Candy
13.plot: After a date night with his wife, Inga, Bryan Wilson wakes up to find her missing from their home. She supposedly ran to the store for candy...but no one sees her again until she turns up dead, 15 miles from their home. Who killed this suburban mother and wife, and why? The FBI will uncover shocking secrets as they look behind the perfect family facade...and figure out what really took place behind closed doors.

14.title: Broken Trust
14.plot: Police get closer to the killer of a family after a little boy's body is found floating.

15.title: Deadly Game
15.plot: Pizza delivery man robs a bank with a strange collar bomb around his neck.

1.title: Killer Fantasy
1.plot: 10-year-old Pamela Butler is rollerblading when a sexual predator snatches her in broad daylight. The FBI identifies their suspect and learns he has sick fantasies of raping and killing girls. Now agents have only hours before his fanatasies come true.

2.title: Do You Want to Die?
2.plot: When 9-year-old Jimmy Ryce vanishes from his bus stop, his parents know something is wrong. A psychic has a vision of what happened to Jimmy but only the FBI can bring justice in this heartbreaking tale.

3.title: The Undertaker
3.plot: Teenaged mother Rachel Timmerman takes her 1-year-old on a date with a mystery man, and sends a letter to her family the next day saying she's run off to marry him. Her body is discovered weeks later in a muddy lake... wrapped with chains and cinder blocks. The FBI goes on a desperate search to figure out who murdered this young woman, and whether her baby, Shannon, is possibly still alive.

4.title: Don't Go Home
4.plot: Kelly Quinn walks into her Nashville home one night, and finds herself at the mercy of two heartless rapists. Her bravery and courage will help the FBI track down the serial rapists, and put an end to their reign of terror.

5.title: Pierced Heart
5.plot: Small-town family man Andie Gasper is murdered behind a shopping center in broad daylight, and the tragic case goes unsolved for 15 years. FBI agents are brought into the cold case, and uncover a twisted tale of sex, greed and broken promises.

6.title: All-American Sex Slaves
6.plot: Detective Deborah Scates is stunned when she interviews a young prostitute in Connecticut, and realizes there is a violent sex slavery ring in this wealthy state. The FBI will bring down this insidious business that is ruining the lives of teenage girls.

7.title: An Unholy Season
7.plot: Christine Aragao can't believe what's happening when she and her two young children are abducted from their Miami parking garage just days before Christmas.

8.title: Trap, Kill, Repeat
8.plot: Women are turning up dead in the Windy City, brutally raped, killed and burned. But in a city this size, it will take time before the FBI realizes they have a monstrous serial killer on their hands who is operating right under everyone's noses.

9.title: Dead Quiet
9.plot: In a university for the deaf, students feel safe until a violent murder happens right on campus. Authorities believe they have the killer until they're proven wrong. Will the FBI find the murderer before he strikes a third time?

10.title: The Woman with the Neck Tattoo
10.plot: In a crowded Chicago bus station on Christmas Eve, a young mother thinks an older woman is helping her when she asks to hold her baby. Then the older woman disappears, taking the child with her. As the clock ticks down, the FBI must find the mysterious stranger... and rescue the child before it's too late.

11.title: Dark Side of the Law
11.plot: Joanne Albanese is a loving single mother with two daughters, who would never leave them alone. So why has she suddenly disappeared after a date with her handsome, mysterious boyfriend? The FBI will uncover a world of deceit, lies, and fake identities as they answer that question...and come up against their worst enemy...a former state trooper who's developed a taste for blood.

12.title: Bombshell
12.plot: Michelle Renee, a bank manager, is held hostage and forced to rob her bank in order to save her daughter's life. But when the robbers accuse Michelle of being in on the plot, the FBI must decide whether she's a victim or an accomplice.

13.title: Maternal Instinct
13.plot: When Bobbi Jo Stinnett is found slaughtered in her home, her unborn baby ripped from her womb, the FBI goes on a frantic search to find the premature infant before she's lost forever. Their search leads nowhere until they uncover a mysterious woman Bobbi Jo was corresponding with on the internet... a woman with the ominous alias of "Fischer for Kids." Can they uncover her true identity in time to save the child?

imdb.title: FBI: Criminal Pursuit
plot: _FBI: Criminal Pursuit_ (qv) is a groundbreaking series that takes the audience inside the 21st Century FBI. The FBI is the most sophisticated law enforcement agency in the world ... pursuing the most dangerous criminals.::mycroftmy
synopsis: "FBI: Criminal Pursuit" takes a deep dive into the modern FBI as they solve some of the most challenging crimes in the 21st Century-featuring the latest solved investigations into murder, kidnappings, cyber criminals and terrorism.
